BIO

I am an Information Science Engineer.I believe that the path of success always depends on these things "HARDWORK and CONFIDENCE", "KEEN TO LEARN SOMETHING NEW" and "EXPLORING THE THINGS". I am looking for a career where I can explore my believes and contribute my knowledge towards the place where I am working.
